caption.p: The O 3 concentration (μg·m −3) anomalies in the Shanghai region in the strong and weak cases (Jul. 2017 and Aug. 2016), which were derived from observation data ( a) and MOZART-4 ( b). The maps were generated using NCL software [The NCAR Command Language (Version 6.3.0) [Software]. (2015). Boulder, Colorado: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/TDD. 10.5065/D6WD3XH5].
